title: Demonique 1-4 (London Night) (1994-1995) (Talon-Novus) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 4 Issues

Demonique #1-4
Publisher:  London Night Studios
Publication Date:  October 1994 - January 1995

Writers:  Michael Shustock and Sky Owens
Penciler:  Sky Owens
Inker:  Chris Fry
Letterer:  Sky Owens
Cover Artist:  Sky Owens

This is a story where Mercenary for hire Dixon Steele (from the 'Marcia Bolens: the Sexecutioner series) is tasked with the mission of delivering a mysterious albino girl to an obscure destination in an European village. Along the way, they are attacked by creatures of the night, where Steele uses his wits and modern weapons to hold the monsters at bay. When he meets the shadowy benefactor, it is revealed that it was a test by the sinister Baron Von Kinsburg to see if the modern man had the resources to stop his hellish hoard. Dixon Steele decides to bring his own fire and brimstone to the Baron's castle-keep and free the captive Demonique.

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
